---
title: "Regions"
output: html_document
---
```{r}
url <- "https://raw.githubusercontent.com/lukes/ISO-3166-Countries-with-Regional-Codes/master/all/all.csv"
read.csv("/IntroDSproject/Final score data/final_score_only.csv")

regions <-read.csv(url)
regions <- regions %>% select(name, region, sub.region)
colnames(regions)[1] <- "CountryName"
final_score_only <- left_join(final_score_only, regions, "CountryName")
write.csv(final_score_only, "final_score_only.csv")
```


# Filling NAs in with average regional values
```{r}
library(dplyr)
library(tidyverse)
library(dslabs)

unique(na.omit(final_score_only$sub.region))

testing <- final_score_only %>% group_by(sub.region) %>% mutate(meandiversity = mean(finalrank_diversity, na.rm = TRUE))
```
